page.content: { { { {Longfield _ 02300361 _is situated in a {pleasant area of north_west Kent,not {far from the industrial towns of {Dartford and Gravesend. The block {contains mainly arable land with the {communities of Longfield;Longfield {Hill;part of Istead Rise and part of {Southfleet,and New Barn. The area lies {within commuting distance of London, {and Longfield Station has a {half_hourly service to Charing Cross {or Victoria. { } Page 1 Gazeteer and Review 2 " " " 3 Clubs and Societies 4 Longfield Hill Women's Inst. 5 " " " " 6
